t = int(raw_input())
for i in xrange(t):
    candles = map(int, raw_input().split())
    minima = min(candles)
    minima_index = candles.index(minima)
    if minima_index == 0:
        if not minima in candles[1:]:
            print 10**(minima+1)
            continue
        else:
            minima_index = candles[1:].index(minima)+1
    num = minima_index
    for j in xrange(minima):
        num += (minima_index)*(10**(j+1))
    print num
